languages.text: Every time the Cyber-Eagle ascends, it provokes AGI Save -{uip|AGI Bonus|8ccf488b5b5d4c1180ff5e44f1ed6bf1} to all enemies around it. On a failure, they are Staggered for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: Every time the Cyber-Eagle ascends, it provokes AGI Save -{uip|AGI Bonus|8ccf488b5b5d4c1180ff5e44f1ed6bf1} to all enemies around it. On a failure, they are Staggered for 1 round.

languages.text: Right before the cyber-eagle begins {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, adjacent enemies must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|AGI Bonus|8ccf488b5b5d4c1180ff5e44f1ed6bf1} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: Когда киберорел поднимается {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздух{/g}, противники на соседних клетках выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|AGI Bonus|8ccf488b5b5d4c1180ff5e44f1ed6bf1} и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломлены{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Right before the cyber-eagle begins {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, adjacent enemies must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|AGI Bonus|8ccf488b5b5d4c1180ff5e44f1ed6bf1} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

Right before the cyber-eagle begins {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, adjacent enemies must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|AGI Bonus|8ccf488b5b5d4c1180ff5e44f1ed6bf1} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

Right before the cyber-eagle begins {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, adjacent enemies must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|AGI Bonus|8ccf488b5b5d4c1180ff5e44f1ed6bf1} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: Siber kartal {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükselmeye{/g} başladıktan hemen sonra bitişikteki düşmanlar, −{uip|AGI Bonus|8ccf488b5b5d4c1180ff5e44f1ed6bf1} ceza puanına sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}afallarlar{/g}. Bu etki 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.
languages.original_text: Right before the cyber-eagle begins {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, adjacent enemies must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|AGI Bonus|8ccf488b5b5d4c1180ff5e44f1ed6bf1} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Siber kartal {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükselmeye{/g} başladıktan hemen sonra bitişikteki düşmanlar, −{uip|AGI Bonus|8ccf488b5b5d4c1180ff5e44f1ed6bf1} ceza puanına sahip bir Çeviklik direnç testinden geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde afallarlar. Bu etki 1 raunt sürer.

Siber kartal {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükselmeye{/g} başladıktan hemen sonra bitişikteki düşmanlar, −{uip|AGI Bonus|8ccf488b5b5d4c1180ff5e44f1ed6bf1} ceza puanına sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde afallarlar. Bu etki 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.

languages.text: Juste avant que le cyber-aigle {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}s'envole{/g}, les ennemis adjacents doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} avec une pénalité de −{uip|AGI Bonus|8ccf488b5b5d4c1180ff5e44f1ed6bf1}, sans quoi ils sont {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}sidérés{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: Right before the cyber-eagle begins {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, adjacent enemies must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|AGI Bonus|8ccf488b5b5d4c1180ff5e44f1ed6bf1} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Juste avant que le cyber-aigle {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}s'envole{/g}, les ennemis adjacents doivent réussir un test de résistance d'Agilité avec une pénalité de −{uip|AGI Bonus|8ccf488b5b5d4c1180ff5e44f1ed6bf1}, sans quoi ils sont sidérés pendant 1 round.

languages.text: Bevor der Cyber-Adler mit dem {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}Aufsteigen{/g} beginnt, müssen angrenzende Gegner eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} mit einem Abzug von −{uip|AGI Bonus|8ccf488b5b5d4c1180ff5e44f1ed6bf1} bestehen, sonst geraten sie 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang ins {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Taumeln{/g}.
languages.original_text: Right before the cyber-eagle begins {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, adjacent enemies must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|AGI Bonus|8ccf488b5b5d4c1180ff5e44f1ed6bf1} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Bevor der Cyber-Adler mit dem {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}Aufsteigen{/g} beginnt, müssen angrenzende Gegner eine Widerstandsprobe auf Beweglichkeit mit einem Abzug von −{uip|AGI Bonus|8ccf488b5b5d4c1180ff5e44f1ed6bf1} bestehen, sonst geraten sie 1 Runde lang ins Taumeln.

languages.text: サイバーイーグルが{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}を始める直前に、隣接する敵は-{uip|AGI Bonus|8ccf488b5b5d4c1180ff5e44f1ed6bf1}のペナルティで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならず、失敗すると1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}状態となる。
languages.original_text: Right before the cyber-eagle begins {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, adjacent enemies must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|AGI Bonus|8ccf488b5b5d4c1180ff5e44f1ed6bf1} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: サイバーイーグルが{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}を始める直前に、隣接する敵は-{uip|AGI Bonus|8ccf488b5b5d4c1180ff5e44f1ed6bf1}のペナルティで敏捷性抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗すると1ラウンドの間よろけ状態となる。
サイバーイーグルが{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}を始める直前に、隣接する敵は-{uip|AGI Bonus|8ccf488b5b5d4c1180ff5e44f1ed6bf1}のペナルティで敏捷性抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗すると1ラウンドの間よろけ状態となる。

languages.text: Когда киберорел поднимается {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздух{/g}, противники на соседних клетках выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|AGI Bonus|8ccf488b5b5d4c1180ff5e44f1ed6bf1} и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломлены{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
languages.original_text: Right before the cyber-eagle begins {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, adjacent enemies must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|AGI Bonus|8ccf488b5b5d4c1180ff5e44f1ed6bf1} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Когда киберорел поднимается {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздух{/g}, противники на соседних клетках выполняют проверку Ловкости на сопротивление со штрафом −{uip|AGI Bonus|8ccf488b5b5d4c1180ff5e44f1ed6bf1} и в случае провала оказываются ошеломлены на 1 раунд.

Когда киберорел поднимается {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздух{/g}, противники на соседних клетках выполняют проверку Ловкости на сопротивление со штрафом −{uip|AGI Bonus|8ccf488b5b5d4c1180ff5e44f1ed6bf1} и в случае провала оказываются ошеломлены на 1 раунд.

languages.text: 生化猎鹰进入{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态前，所有邻近敌人都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-{uip|AGI Bonus|8ccf488b5b5d4c1180ff5e44f1ed6bf1}减值，若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: Right before the cyber-eagle begins {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, adjacent enemies must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|AGI Bonus|8ccf488b5b5d4c1180ff5e44f1ed6bf1} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 生化猎鹰进入{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态前，所有邻近敌人都需要进行敏捷抗性检定，且在此次检定中承受-{uip|AGI Bonus|8ccf488b5b5d4c1180ff5e44f1ed6bf1}减值，若未能通过检定，则会陷入恐慌状态，持续一轮。

languages.text: Justo antes de que la ciberáguila se {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}eleve{/g}, los enemigos adyacentes deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} con una penalización de −{uip|AGI Bonus|8ccf488b5b5d4c1180ff5e44f1ed6bf1} o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrados{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text: Right before the cyber-eagle begins {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, adjacent enemies must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|AGI Bonus|8ccf488b5b5d4c1180ff5e44f1ed6bf1} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Justo antes de que la ciberáguila se {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}eleve{/g}, los enemigos adyacentes deben superar una prueba de fortaleza de Agilidad con una penalización de −{uip|AGI Bonus|8ccf488b5b5d4c1180ff5e44f1ed6bf1} o quedar desequilibrados durante 1 asalto.

Justo antes de que el águila cibernética comience a volar {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}{/g} , los enemigos adyacentes deben superar una prueba de Resistencia a la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} con una penalización de -{uip|AGI Bonus|8ccf488b5b5d4c1180ff5e44f1ed6bf1} o quedan {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrados{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
